member.name: T:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes
member.summary: Enum containing all the different generator flags

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.None
member.summary: No Flags, just simple name generation

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.Numbers
member.summary: A number between 0 and 999 will be appended to the name

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.NameTypes.Hashtag
member.summary: A hashtag will come before the name

member.name: T:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes
member.summary: Enum containing all the different characters thatt can be used for spaces

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes.None
member.summary: No space character, all letters come right after one another

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes.Space
member.summary: Space character used the space character

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes.Underscore
member.summary: Underscore used as the space character

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes.Hyphen
member.summary: Hyphen , AKA dash, used as the space character

member.name: F:NameGenerator.IGenerator.SpaceTypes.Period
member.summary: A period used as the space character
